scenario_text.value:
Are you really all right, Aoi? Something must
have happened.

The thing is...Labramon said some awful
things to me...
And to you, of all people?!

I was incredibly shocked. But Labramon kept
saying nasty stuff, again and again.

(I canâ€™t imagine Labramon speaking a single
mean word to her...)

It felt like my heart being ripped out of my
chest...
